comments.body:
Good; let me offer a bit expanded file header (cause this file, once released, will get copied around, *a lot*):

```
#  This file is part of Redis. https://redis.io/
#  SPDX-License-Identifier: BSD-3-Clause
# 
```

(compare to, e.g. `systemctl cat getty@.service`)
About the license tag, see here https://softwareengineering.stackexchange.com/a/381907/49834

Sorry for my late response - my father passed away last week, and I couldn't get myself to work on stuff like this since then. I'll consider your suggestions and get back to you and this issue/PR soon.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@# example systemd service unit file for redis-server
#
# In order to use this as a template for providing a redis service in your
